Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display the <font face="courier new">StatusStrip</font> control with the <font face="courier new">Table</font> layout and also add "Page number" text as an item. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
StatusStrip ststrpPage = new StatusStrip();
ststrpPage.Items.Add("Page number");
ststrpPage.LayoutStyle = ToolStripLayoutStyles.Table;

StatusStrip ststrpPage = new StatusStrip();
ststrpPage.Item.Add("Page number");
ststrpPage.LayoutStyle = ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table;

StatusStrip ststrpPage = new StatusStrip();
ststrpPage.Items.Add("Page number");
ststrpPage.LayoutStyle = ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table;

StatusStrip ststrpPage = new StatusStrip();
ststrpPage.Items.Add("Page number");
ststrpPage.LayoutStyle() = ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table;

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (C).
